knimeNode.name: Image Calculator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Evaluates mathematical formula on images, appending result as a new image column or replacing an input column.

intro.p: This node evaluates a (free-form) mathematical expression based on the images in a row. The computed results can be either appended as new column or be used to replace an input column. Available variables are the values in the corresponding row of the table (left list in the dialog). Commonly used functions are shown in the list "Mathematical Functions".

This node uses JEP , the
Java Math Expression Parser .

tab.name: Math Expression
tab.option: Available image input columns. Click any column name to include the value in the expression text field.
Mathematical functions that can be used, the tooltip shows a short description for each function.
A mathematical expression. Constants, e.g. numbers (2*...) can be used as well, but at least one image column must be part of the expression.
Specifies the pixel type of the result image (and the pixel types of the intermediate result images).

tab.name: Advanced Settings
tab.option: Result images get dimensionality definitions and metadata from the reference image. If none is selected the reference column will be set to the first column in the incoming table that is used in the computed expression.
Activate to allow calculations on images with different dimensionalities. The result dimension will be taken from the reference image.

views.view: More detailed view on the result images.
